list.definition: {"database":"flow_metrics","sql":"SELECT pod_cluster as `value`, pod_cluster as `display_name` FROM `vtap_flow_port.1m` WHERE  time >= ${__from:date:seconds} AND time <= ${__to:date:seconds} GROUP BY `value` LIMIT 999999999999t","useDisabled":true,"useAny":true}
list.name: cluster

query.sql: SELECT pod_cluster as `value`, pod_cluster as `display_name` FROM `vtap_flow_port.1m` WHERE  time >= ${__from:date:seconds} AND time <= ${__to:date:seconds} GROUP BY `value` LIMIT 999999999999

list.definition: {"database":"flow_metrics","sql":"SELECT pod_service AS value , pod_service AS display_name FROM `vtap_app_port.1m` WHERE pod_cluster IN (${cluster:singlequote})  AND pod_service LIKE '$wildcard'  GROUP BY `value`","useAny":true,"useDisabled":true}
list.name: dns_service

query.sql: SELECT pod_service AS value , pod_service AS display_name FROM `vtap_app_port.1m` WHERE pod_cluster IN (${cluster:singlequote})  AND pod_service LIKE '$wildcard'  GROUP BY `value`

list.definition: {"database":"flow_metrics","sql":"show tag chost values from vtap_app_port where display_name like '$db_wildcard'","useDisabled":true,"useAny":true}
list.name: dns_chost

query.sql: show tag chost values from vtap_app_port where display_name like '$db_wildcard'
